goal.ch:
培養化學專業知識 (以有機化學原理，使學生對有機反應、合成方法及其應用等更深入的了解，且可導引其應用反應機構推論反應可能之走向)
培養發掘問題與思考的能力
強化表達能力
養成協調與領導的能力
goal.en: To provide the students in chemistry with a sufficient foundation to comprehend and use the research literature in organic synthesis via reaction mechanisms understanding.

outline.ch: 此課程的主要目的是以官能基及反應機構為中心來引介有機化學原理，使學生對有機反應、合成方法及其應用等知識更深入的了解，且可導引其應用反應機構推論反應可能之走向，借此可進一步微調主產物之產率，培養學生對有機反應的獨立思考及問題解決能力，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
outline.en: “In a qualitative to semiquantitative fashion, mechanisms, synthesis and stereochemistry are discussed throughout the course to train students to apply the subject of organic chemistry to related fields by providing participants with a fundamental background and concept of organic synthesis.“

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.
